author: Special Correspondent
text:
Over 200 students from various colleges formed a human chain on Saturday to create awareness among the public on glaucoma. Organised by Dr. Agarwal’s Eye Hospital, the students formed an awareness human chain near VOC Grounds in Palayamkottai with placards about glaucoma, an eye disease that damages the optic nerve and impairs vision.

Check up

It sometimes progresses to blindness too. The participants of the human chain urged the public to check their vision every year.
title: Raising awareness of glaucoma
